alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:49PM EDT until April 01 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seneca County in central New York... Schuyler County in central New York... Yates County in central New York... Western Cayuga County in central New York... Northwestern Chemung County in central New York... Northeastern Steuben County in central New York... Western Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Greece to Cameron, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Auburn, Seneca Falls, Bath, Newfield, Waterloo, Penn Yan, Hector, Romulus and Fayette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cayuga; Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
